name: 分子模擬
description:
(1) guiding students to establish concepts of computational chemistry  
(2) introducing how computational chemistry is applied to chemistry research.
goals: guiding students to establish concepts of computational chemistry
introducing how computational chemistry is applied to chemistry research
syllabus:
**授課方式：16+2週。****彈性教學****2****週**：  
包含數位學習、實作與專題、探究、自主學習。

1\. Modeling of energy of molecules  
 Empirical functions: Molecular Mechanics force field  
  
2\. Energy minimization procedure:  
Steepest Descent method  
Conjugate gradient  
Newton Raphson method  
  
3\. Modeling Complex Molecular Systems  
  
(1) Monte Carlo Method  
Random number generator  
Metropolis MC  
  
  
(2) Docking computation for ligand-protein complexes

(3) Molecular Dynamics Simulation:  
Algorithms of differential equation integrator  
Simulation at constant temperature and pressure  
  
4\. Special topics:  
  
(1) Bio-molecule simulation  
Free energy calculation  
(2) Other advanced topics  
Kinetics of biochemical reactions
